## Matrix.transpose() method

Returns the transpose of the matrix

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
transpose(): Matrix<S>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[Matrix](./vector.matrix.md)<!-- -->&lt;S&gt;

The transpose

## Remarks

The transpose of a matrix A is the unique matrix for which the entry at `(i,j)` is equal to the entry in A at `(j, i)`
